detail_desc: Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a lace yoke, small stand-up collar and partially concealed button placket. Short frilled lace sleeves, box pleat at the back and gently rounded hem.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a lace yoke, small stand-up collar and partially concealed button placket. Short frilled lace sleeves, box pleat at the back and gently rounded hem.
V-neck satin top with a lace trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.
V-neck satin top with a lace trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in a lightly crêped weave with a V-neck at the back, lacing at the front and concealed zip in the side. Unlined.

Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with decorative pleats at the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.

Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with decorative pleats at the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.

Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with decorative pleats at the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Non-wired bra in soft cotton jersey with moulded, lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support.
Joggers in soft jersey with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.

Fitted top in soft jersey with short flounced sleeves and frills on the shoulders. Gathers in the sides for a good fit over the tummy.

Short 5-pocket patterned denim skirt with a zip fly and button and raw-edge hem.
Bikini top with a decorative knot detail and underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Ties at the back of the neck and back.(Adjustable fastener at the back in sizes 36D-38B).
